programs.title: +2 Science
programs.description: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics with Optional Math compulsory. Pre-medical & Pre-engineering preparation included.

programs.title: +2 Management
programs.description: Accountancy, Economics, Business Studies with Pre-CMAT preparation. Gateway to CA, Banking & Business careers.

programs.title: +2 Humanities
programs.description: Sociology, Mass Communication, Rural Development. Prepare for careers in journalism, NGO & public service.

programs.title: +2 Law
programs.description: Constitutional Law, Jurisprudence, Procedural Law. Foundation for legal profession and law entrance exams.

programs.title: BCA Program
programs.description: 126 credit hours, 8 semesters. Training in React, Node.js, Laravel, Django & network certifications.

programs.title: BBS Program
programs.description: Comprehensive business education with specializations in Finance, Marketing & HR. Pathway to MBA.

programs.title: CA Coaching
programs.description: CAP I, II, III preparation through Academy of Commerce. ICAN & ICAI affiliated with articleship placement.
